attributes.additional_details: Over 400 troops have died in this controversial War. How many more need to be given to there family's in a box before something is done? Yes are great country treats are soldiers with the highest level of respect with a state funeral. And the reassurance to the family's that there name will not be forgotten, nor will there death go unpunished. But the original goal of the war has been achieved, the training is finished. Are troops/assistance is no longer needed. So I ask the people to sign this petition to help stop the needless deaths of are brave men and women.
